title: Medical Cannabis Program
description: Qualifying patients in DC have the right to obtain and use marijuana for medical purposes.
cleaned_text: On October 1, 2020, the District's medical cannabis program was transferred from DC Health to the [Alcoholic Beverage and Cannabis Administration](https://gcc02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fabra.dc.gov%2F&data=04%7C01%7Celizabeth.brooks%40dc.gov%7C554adca8beba4466f4f408d8c9ec7b80%7C8fe449f18b944fb799066f939da82d73%7C0%7C0%7C637481364800999274%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tI2cvWI6xvPBrRcYxFsidlsMcXnRJ46x4XqWnnmDxWc%3D&reserved=0). Program details and applications are available at [https://abca.dc.gov/page/medical-cannabis-program](https://abca.dc.gov/page/medical-cannabis-program). Patient, caregiver, and healthcare practitioner related inquiries should be emailed to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#33727170721d70525d5d52515a407a5d555c7357501d545c45). Medical cannabis facility inquiries should be emailed to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a3e2e1e0e28de0c2cdcdc2c1cad0efcac0c6cdd0cacdc4e3c7c08dc4ccd5). Contact Phone: (202) 442-4423 Contact TTY: 711 Office Hours: Monday through Friday 8 am -
